sentences.sContent: Dioxins are unwanted byproducts of some industrial processes and waste incineration.
sentences.sContent_eng: Dioxins are unwanted byproducts of some industrial processes and waste incineration.
sentences.sCn: 二恶英是一些工业过程和废物焚化的有害副产品。

sentences.sContent: Very few plants have provisions for the separate disposal of grease to scavengers or by incineration.
sentences.sContent_eng: Very few plants have provisions for the separate disposal of grease to scavengers or by incineration.
sentences.sCn: 几乎没有工厂采用清除器对油脂进行分别处置，或采用焚化进行处置的措施。

sentences.sContent: Senior middle school or above with 2 years' operating experience in incineration plant, power or cogeneration plant, chemical plant. Or.
sentences.sContent_eng: Senior middle school or above with 2 years' operating experience in incineration plant, power or cogeneration plant, chemical plant. Or.
sentences.sCn: 高中及以上学历：焚化厂、热电厂或化工厂2年以上生产操作工作经验；

remMethod.val: 来自incinerate(v. 焚化， 火葬)
